snippet: State officials are projecting that the state will collect $187 million less in taxes through June 2016 than anticipated.
abstract: Kansas officials project that state will collect $187 million less in taxes, through June 2016, than anticipated.
lead_paragraph: State officials are projecting that the state will collect $187 million less in taxes through June 2016 than anticipated.

headline.main: Kansas: Tax Revenues Do Not Meet Expectations
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Tax Revenues Do Not Meet Expectations
